desc: 攻撃ＢＢの威力を大幅にアップ＆ＢＣ出現率をかなりアップ

dictionary.lore: The emblem of the Silver Knights, the 21st Demon Slayers Division. When the division was first formed, then-commander Noah commissioned a craftsman from the Randall Empire to make these for his subordinates. Though now it is but the mere ornate symbol of a group long-disbanded, the demonic power it holds is said to provide its wearer with divine protection whilst on the battlefield.

name: 銀騎士隊の聖印
